about_the_game: A haunting yet alluring tune pervades the lonely town of Yomawari: Midnight Shadows. This is a melody of sorrow, hope, danger, and exhilaration. Listen to Yomawari: Midnight Shadows - Main Theme and be drawn into the nightmarish yet beautiful world of Yui and Haru, and brace yourself for the dangers ahead.

short_description: A singular tune that defines the series of Yomawari. In Yomawari: Midnight Shadows, the Main Theme tells the tale of two young girls who have been separated in the dark and must brave the darkness to find their way home.
